com.github.katjahahn

Class PESignature

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.PEModule
      • com.github.katjahahn.PESignature

  • public class PESignature
extends PEModule
    Reads the offset of the PE signature and the signature itself. Can be used to verify that the file is indeed a PE file.
